programme.title: JAG: Killer Instinct
programme.desc: Louis Cellucci is having a rough time aboard the flight deck of the USS Benjamin Harrison. Moments after he walks away from another failed attempt at fixing an F-14, shouts of Man Overboard! are heard across the deck.(n)

programme.title: JAG: To Walk on Wings
programme.desc: Congresswoman Latham and a colleague watch four marine jumpers jump into the ocean from an M22 Osprey. With two marines left to jump, the plane is struck by a swell in the ocean. Harm and Mac are instructed to investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Guilt
programme.desc: When Captain Huddleston hears that the marine corporal has been charged with rape, he sends Lt. Colonel Sarah Mac MacKenzie to handle the case in a hot zone of Anti-American activity.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Mixed Messages
programme.desc: An intruder shoots three Navy people, killing two. One of the dead is a friend of Harm, who protects his reputation. Webb, counter-espionage, and disinformation are involved; Bud solves it. Mac and Renee return to town; Mac leaves again.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Ambush
programme.desc: Capt. Shepard leads his troop off its peacekeeping mission and into battle with the colonel of the rebel forces. Consequently, six marines die in the public incident. Harm is sent in to investigate despite a recent touch of bad luck in a string of trials.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Jag-a-thon
programme.desc: The JAG gang takes part in a JAGathon, a charity-benefit marathon, which provides opportunities for personal pride and individual competitiveness. Sturgis feels uncertain, and Harm defends a sailor for impersonating an officer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Single Point of Failure
programme.desc: The Governor calls on Team Scorpion when his daughter is mysteriously "bio-hacked" with a deadly virus and has only 24 hours to live.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: A Cyclone
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is determined to prove their worth when a bomber threatens to take out the internet infrastructure of the entire Southwest.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Shorthanded
programme.desc: Team Scorpion heads to Las Vegas for a simple casino job, but a robbery leads to Walter's arrest and the rest of the team is left to clear his name.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Plutonium Is Forever
programme.desc: To fix a Los Angeles nuclear reactor that's on the verge of a cataclysmic meltdown, Walter and the team must reluctantly enlist the help of a troubled former member.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: True Colors
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must pass a mandated psych evaluation or face being disbanded after they're accused of destroying a priceless work of art in an attempt to protect an art exhibit.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Father's Day
programme.desc: A case gets personal for Team Scorpion when three convicts break out of prison and one of them is a brilliant hacker who was forced to help the others steal billions online.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The team are still spread thinly across this huge location and without the safety of numbers some of the investigators seem easy prey.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: The last part sees the team reach their limits as the spirits of this enormous location continue to emerge from the shadows. But will the enormity of the paranormal activity prove too much for the world-famous team.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: A haunted house, a haunted school and a haunted auction hall, all in one location, Bishton Hall. With stories of poltergeist activity, ghostly figures, strange voices and a dark entity, what will the Most Haunted team uncover tonight.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Textbook Case
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to an abandoned school in Barnegat, New Jersey. Could the apparition of a beloved community teacher be luring children inside the building or are other spirits at play?(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Alcatraz
programme.desc: For the 100thepisode of Ghost Hunters, the team is allowed private access to Alcatraz Island, a dream come true for paranormal teams.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Murdered Matron
programme.desc: Special guest investigator Meredith Vieira joins the TAPS team, as they investigate Sailors' Snug Harbor in Staten Island, New York. Once a retirement home to weathered seaman, it's now home to the spirit of a murdered matron.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to the historic St. Charles, Missouri to investigateMain Street's hauntings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.244
programme.desc: A woman sues the father of her two daughters for half of his tax return. Another woman's son is killed in a hit-and-run by a drunk driver, dividing former friends over a loan made from the insurance settlement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.122
programme.desc: Woman and niece sue niece's ex-friend over wrecked Jeep Commander/injured woman sues for nude photos posted online/woman sues estranged daughter-in-law for loan to recover repossessed car.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.126
programme.desc: A loose barter arrangement for rent ends with a woman suing her ex-landlord for allegedly evicting her from his home and failing to return her belongings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.41
programme.desc: Young man smashes TV after stepfather allegedly points gun; sues for false vandalism, terrorist threats charges/Teen sues former friend for car-taking, damage; he claims permission to buy cigarettes.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.200
programme.desc: Teens deny vandalizing a teacher's car with rocks; a surprise witness emerges. A woman sues her ex-fiancé for money invested in his home and furniture return.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.233
programme.desc: A man faces a lawsuit for unpaid rent and property damage stemming from a Jacuzzi party, marijuana arrests, and roommate issues. Another man accuses his cousin of violence and property damage after refusing her late-night alcohol run request.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.58
programme.desc: Man and stepson suing ex-friend for iPod and necklace face weakened case due to internet slander. Woman demands ex-fiancé pay Home Depot card charges; he claims items used to fix her home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.91
programme.desc: Man claims ex-lover forced him to spend on her charge card, even for her own birthday gifts. Woman sues ex-boyfriend for electric bill cost; he argues he covered her rent after she broke the lease.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.136
programme.desc: Man racks up $3,600 on ex's credit card, claims shared benefit; childhood friends dispute dating, feud over big-screen TV ownership.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.143
programme.desc: Dispute arises from dramatic 911 call of husband mauled by pit bull; family feud ensues. Woman sues daughter’s ex-friends for misusing car purchase funds.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.64
programme.desc: A woman claims she was doused with lighter fluid during an argument with her ex-roommate; he claims she had him falsely arrested and countersues for return of belongings.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.187
programme.desc: A man sacrifices his job and house to move for his girlfriend but faces a broken lease and ring dispute after their breakup. Another man is sued by his child's grandmother for allegedly vandalizing her Chrysler Sebring.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: High and Low Spirits
programme.desc: First, Lou and Froy tail an upper class debtor to an upscale restaurant where the food is almost as unpalatable as its clientele's attitude. Then, Lyndah and Froy head to a residential district to repossess a van that is busy being loaded up with stolen e.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Outside the Box
programme.desc: First, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a baffling marital spat involving a man, his wife, and her untrustworthy yoga instructor. Then, Sonia and Lyndah hit the fashion district to repossess a van from a designer who's way ahead of the curve.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart
programme.sub-title: Horse Semen & the Rolls Royce Golf Cart
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Involuntary Voluntary
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia head out to the farm to repossess a truck from an entitled equestrian who would rather die than let the repo team get their hands on what's in the back. Then, Lou and Sonia stumble into the middle of a prolonged business dispute...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy's Bait and Lou's Cake
programme.desc: Lou and Matt inadvertently become pawns in an elaborate and misguided lesson perpetrated by a cheating husband upon his mistress. Then, Matt and Lou attempt to take a vehicle away from a debtor who is so drunk he doesn't remember agreeing.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Blow-Up and Cool Down
programme.desc: Lou and Froy set out some bait in a gated community to attract a security guard who's slow to make his payments, but quick to pull out his pepper spray. Then, Matt and Lou crash a wedding to repo a car from a truant DJ, but will they be able to get away?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah reclaim a riding mower from a housewife and her grab-happy husband. Then, Sonia and Matt head out on a scorcher of an afternoon for a repossession. Will they be able to beat both the heat and a pair of geriatric debtors?(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Naked and Dangerous
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah try to negotiate a set of keys away from a raucous group of drunken outdoorsmen. Then, Froy and Lyndah repo a vehicle from a unruly and untalented guitarist. Plus, Froy and Sonia bite off more than they can chew.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Monster of a Problem
programme.desc: Sonia and Lyndah try to repossess a hot tub away from a group of upset partiers. Then, Lou and Matt try to negotiate with a pair of unintelligible and enraged parade participants. And, Lou and Lyndah must repo a car from a group of old men.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hooligans and Explosions
programme.desc: Will a frying pan-wielding housewife stop Lou and Sonia from getting their car? Plus, a repo involving a truck filled with black market contraband goes horrifyingly wrong for Matt and Froy.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: To try to show his care and interest in their relationship, Jeff sends Audrey on a scavenger hunt. Russell thinks Jennifer has a sex tape and enlists Timmy's help in finding it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: A Big Bust
programme.desc: Audrey believes her maid needs an operation to correct the limp she has to be able to walk better, thinking she is doing the right thing Audrey asks her neighbors to contribute to the cause not having any idea what the money is really intended for.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: After The Lovin'
programme.desc: Frustrated by his boss blaming him for burning his mouth on hot soup, Timmy has a special spoon created for Russell. Audrey's plan backfires when she tries to seduce Jeff in the bedroom in order to get him to complete household tasks.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Missed Connections
programme.desc: Timmy wants to reconnect with a woman he met on the subway; Jeff and Audrey turn on each other when former friends snub them.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Five Things
programme.desc: Jeff can't think of five nice things to say about Audrey; Russell encourages Timmy to serenade a woman; Jennifer and Adam mistakenly get Jeff and Audrey's bank statement.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Meat Wars
programme.desc: Audrey drags Jen to a Bon Jovi concert to prove that she's still young and fun, leaving Jeff and Adam at home. Russell finds a phone number in his pocket and asks Timmy to investigate.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Goodbye Dolly
programme.desc: Audrey tries to prepare for motherhood by continuing to repair a doll that she keeps damaging. Meanwhile, Jeff questions whether the very pregnant Brenda should be dating anymore, and Adam tries to convince Jennifer that he is a manly man.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Audrey's Shower
programme.desc: Jen puts the wrong date on the invitations to Audrey's baby shower, Jeff likes Audrey's maternity clothes, and Russell gives up women.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Liz Moves In
programme.desc: Liz temporarily moves in with Jeff and Audrey. Jeff isn't happy with the new guest, but changes his mind when he discovers Liz consistently takes his side against Audrey.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Taking Names
programme.desc: Jeff and Audrey realize that the names on their baby list are also the names of women that Russell has slept with. Adam becomes a cycling enthusiast after Jennifer suggests they start riding bikes in the park.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Comeback Kid
programme.desc: Dog is back in Colorado chasing a young man with a taste for trouble. He's fled to Texas but with his family's house on the line Dog is willing to try a risky strategy.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tent City
programme.desc: Today's hunt takes Dog far from the glittering hotels of Waikiki to the parts of Hawaii tourist rarely see, Oahu's ramshackle tent cities. The team searches for a woman who has lost almost everything, her home, her family and her spirit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Dog's good friend and fellow bondsman Chris is running out of time. He has only days to find his fugitive or risk losing his business. In his hunt Dog confronts duplicitous tipsters, vicious attack dogs, and hostile neighbors.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Montrose Files: The Million Dollar Man Pt. 2

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Dallas Mavericks
programme.desc: Military-grade Tomahawk cruise missile jet engine; century-old handcrafted wild west cowboy saddle; 1960s high roller's gold money.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Knuckle Dust
programme.desc: 1870s French Jarre Dolne Knuckle Duster revolver-knife-brass knuckle combo, a rare original George Rodrigue "Blue Dog" screenprint and a 1980 autographed Raging Bull movie poster.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Big Score
programme.desc: At a climate-controlled storage facility in downtown L.A., Allen and Ton's locker wins score them an antique cash register and a German H&K pistol prized by collectors.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Night of the Digging Dead
programme.desc: A custom-built shark cage; 1900s pathologist's dissection toolkit; 1940s embalming pump and one of the first electric bone saws.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Disco and Dice
programme.desc: 1978 Williams Disco pinball machine; 1898 dice popper gambling device; talking 1990s bar top breathalyzer; deadly fishing harpoon.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Real Thing
programme.desc: Allen and Ton compete with a notorious deep-pocketed bidder in Oxnard, CA, and score a vintage Coca-Cola vending machine, a vintage desk and a rare 1971 GMC truck.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Fake Punt Payoff
programme.desc: Ton and Allen contend with a large crowd of inexperienced auction-buyers at a huge storage container auction in Pasadena. They find a small fleet of Segway personal transporters and an enormous custom-made shotgun.(n)
